block.p: Rebecca Hewitt, a daughter of Barbara Best of Troy, Mich., and Charles Hewitt of Severna Park, Md., was married yesterday to Peter Lindsay O'Reilly, a son of Seton and Gerald A. O'Reilly of Litchfield, Conn. The Rev. Edward Lawlor performed the ceremony at St. Theresa's Roman Catholic Church in Charlestown, on Nevis, in the West Indies.

The bride, 31, is an actress in Manhattan who has appeared in commercials and independent films. She also acts in Off Off Broadway plays, most recently in ''The Sacred Virgin'' at the 13th Street Repertory Company in New York. She graduated from the University of Colorado. Her father, who is retired, was president of the Satellite Broadcasting and Communications Association, a trade organization in Alexandria, Va. The bride is a stepdaughter of Pamela Hewitt and of Scott Best.
